sections.name: Needs
sections.description: What the customer wants or requires - the primary goal of the installation.

sections.name: Working at heights
sections.description: Details of required scaffolding, ladders, roof work, or any elevated access requirements.

sections.name: System characteristics
sections.description: Current boiler type, pipe size, heating system condition, and existing setup details.

sections.name: Future plans
sections.description: Notes about any future work or follow-on visits.

sections.name: Components that require assistance
sections.description: Heavy lifting requirements, specialist tools needed, or tasks requiring a second engineer.

sections.name: Restrictions to work
sections.description: Time constraints, access issues, no working during certain hours, or other limitations.

sections.name: External hazards
sections.description: Asbestos, dangerous dogs, poor access to property, confined spaces, or other safety concerns.

sections.name: Delivery notes
sections.description: Specific instructions for material drop-off, collection, or delivery timing.

sections.name: Office notes
sections.description: Internal billing information, scheduling requirements, or paperwork instructions.

sections.name: New boiler and controls
sections.description: SIMPLE ACTION-FOCUSED BULLETS ONLY. What equipment is being installed/removed and where. Include all quote items (boiler, cylinder, filter, power flush, sure stop, controls, etc). Example: 'Replace regular boiler with Worcester 30i combi in same position' or 'Install Worcester 24Ri system boiler in kitchen, 180L Megaflo cylinder in airing cupboard, Fernox TF1 filter, Surestop valve'.

sections.name: Flue
sections.description: SIMPLE ACTION-FOCUSED BULLETS ONLY. What flue work is to be done. Examples: 'Brick up balanced flue and install fanned flue' or 'Install vertical flue through roof with tile adapter' or 'Extend existing flue 2m using 60/100mm PVC'. Only include complex routes if specifically described.

sections.name: Pipe work
sections.description: SIMPLE ACTION-FOCUSED BULLETS ONLY. What pipework changes are needed. Examples: 'Upgrade gas supply from meter to boiler position' or 'Replace primary flow and return between loft and airing cupboard' or 'Reroute condensate to external drain'. Include sizes only when critical (e.g., '28mm primaries' or '22mm gas').

sections.name: Disruption
sections.description: Expected noise, dust, utility shut-offs, and timeline for the work. Help customer understand what to expect.

sections.name: Customer actions
sections.description: What the customer needs to do before or during the installation (e.g., clear cupboard space, provide keys, be present at certain times).
